pkgmetadata.longdescription: Query 'HaploReg', 'RegulomeDB' // A set of utilities for querying 'HaploReg' https://pubs.broadinstitute.org/mammals/haploreg/haploreg.php, 'RegulomeDB' https://www.regulomedb.org/regulome-search/ web- based tools. The package connects to 'HaploReg', 'RegulomeDB' searches and downloads results, without opening web pages, directly from R environment. Results are stored in a data frame that can be directly used in various kinds of downstream analyses.
